app.name: CBHC Installer Mod
app.long_description:
Converts Haxchi into an Autoboot solution. Boots you directly into CFW on startup or to an app you specify in settings.
ONLY USE THIS IF YOU ARE WILLING TO TAKE A RISK OF BRICKING YOUR CONSOLE. Don't format the WiiU. Don't delete user account used to buy the game for exploit. Don't reinstall the same DS game used for exploit. Don't install Haxchi over CBHC.
